title: LeaverBusted for going to take a (much larger than expected) dump during loading screen
body:
So 20 minutes later, I accept the queue. It says I'm the only person to accept. 2 minutes of that loading bar animation thing later, it says I failed to accept queue and get booted out of it. I requeue. 20 more minutes later, I get "put in queue"

http://imgur.com/HmFTlNA
As of typing this, it's actually at 8 minutes and still queue hasn't popped

Fuck you, rito game
